com.jbion.utils.progress

Class OneTimeProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jbion.utils.progress.AbstractProgressBar
      • com.jbion.utils.progress.OneTimeProgressBar

  • public class OneTimeProgressBar
extends AbstractProgressBar
    A progress bar that does not need to be erased by backspaces and does not create new lines at each update. For the user to be able to visualize the length of such a bar, it needs to be used with a header.
    Author:
    Joffrey Bion
    See Also:
    HeaderStyle, AbstractProgressBar.setHeaderStyle(HeaderStyle)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates a new OneTimeProgressBar with a default header.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OneTimeProgressBar

        public OneTimeProgressBar(int total,
                  int length)
        Creates a new OneTimeProgressBar with a default header.
        Parameters:
        total - The number of elements this ProgressBar represents.
        length - The number of characters used to display this AbstractProgressBar when it is complete.
